descriptions: Managed project documentation for the Aloha Flyover project, a large-scale infrastructure project in Surabaya, ensuring 100% accuracy and timely updates for key milestones and deliverables.
Oversaw inventory management for over hundreds of construction materials.
Developed a critical AutoCAD drawing for the Aloha Flyover project, contributing a detailed site plan that served as a key reference for construction crews.
Performed detailed quantity and quality checks of steel reinforcement in foundations for the Aloha Flyover project, ensuring compliance with design specifications.

Designed and implemented custom scripts using the Pawn programming language, creating scalable systems that supported a platform with thousands of registered users and hundreds of concurrent participants at its peak.
Integrated a MySQL database for efficient data management, optimizing query performance and ensuring data integrity, contributing to seamless operations for a high-traffic server.
Diagnosed and resolved software issues, ensuring stable performance and seamless user interactions, even under high traffic with hundreds of concurrent participants.
Leveraged version control tools like Git and implemented advanced code optimization techniques, improving codebase maintainability and enabling faster feature development cycles.
